alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 12:12AM CDT until August 13 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1212 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Lacreek Wildlife Refuge, or 16 miles southeast of Martin, moving east-southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Crookston, Eli and Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 140 and 185. Highway 97 near mile marker 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
